title: Where is Renee Zellweger from and is she in a relationship?
text:
Renee Zellweger is back on the big screen in Judy (Picture: FilmMagic)

Renee Zellweger is back on the big screen, looking every inch like Judy Garland as she plays the screen legend in the biopic Judy.

The movie, which was released in UK cinemas on Friday, sees the actress playing her in her final years as she attempts to resurrect her career and finances with a gig in London.

And she’s won rave reviews for the movie, with critics suggesting she could nab her second Oscar (after previously winning for Cold Mountain back in 2004)

As Renee appears on This Morning on Monday to talk about the movie and all things Judy, here’s what you need to know about the actress.

Where is Renee Zellweger from?

Renee Zellweger is originally from the city of Katy, Texas.

The actress looks unrecognisable as Judy Garland in Judy (Picture: Pathe)

She was born on 25 April 1969, meaning she celebrated her 50th birthday earlier this year.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Although she is from Texas her family roots stretch beyond there, as her father is from Switzerland while her mother is Norwegian.

Renee began her acting career in the early 90s with roles in the likes of Reality Bites, Empire Records, 8 Seconds and Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Next Generation.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

However her breakthrough came alongside Tom Cruise in 1996’s Oscar nominee Jerry Maguire, in which she played single mum Dorothy Boyd – who famously uttered the ‘you had me at hello’ line.

Renee won an Academy Award for her role in Cold Mountain (Picture: AP)

Since then she’s notched up an impressive body of work, winning Oscar nominations for her roles in Bridget Jones’ Diary and Chicago, as well as winning Golden Globes for Cold Mountain, Chicago and the dark comedy-thriller Nurse Betty.

Is Renee Zellweger in a relationship?

Renee was most recently in a relationship with musician Doyle Bramhall II (Picture: Getty Images)

Renee Zellweger was most recently in a long-term relationship with musician and songwriter Doyle Bramhall II – although it’s been reported that they split earlier this year.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Prior to dating him she was married to singer Kenny Chesney, tying the knot with him in May 2005.

However that marriage ended in annulment just four months later.

Renee also dated Bradley Cooper from 2009-2011 after they met on the set of the film Case 39.

She also was in a brief relationship with White Stripes frontman Jack White, and was previously engaged to Jim Carrey, whom she worked with on the Farrelly Brothers comedy Me, Myself and Irene.

This Morning is on Monday on ITV from 10.30am.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Renee Zellweger is back on the big screen in Judy Garland biopic Judy, and she's heading to This Morning on Monday to talk about it.
